text: hello ! i ' ve a dog . what kind of dogs do you have ? mine is a cat .
i don ' t have any pets . i ' m a veggie . do you like meat ?
i do . i do not eat meat . what is your favorite food ? my three siblings eat meat a lot .
i love pizza . do they have purple and green in their room ? i have purple in mine .
pizza is great . they ' re all vegan . i like to eat tacos and pizza .
i have a horse . what do you do for fun ? i ride horses in my free time .
that ' s a nice hobby . i enjoy hanging out with my three sisters , who live on the farm .
do you go to school ? i finished high school two years ago . i want to graduate in two .
i am a junior in high school . congratulations on graduation ! i am studying to be a vet .
that is awesome ! i was going to go to vet school but i decided to be an animal vet instead .
